thread.title: Kal Penn Hilariously Spoofs Kellyanne Conway's Couch Photo!
thread.title_full: Kal Penn Hilariously Spoofs Kellyanne Conway's Viral Couch Photo! | PerezHilton.com

author: perezhilton
title: Kal Penn Hilariously Spoofs Kellyanne Conway's Couch Photo!
text:
We love the Internet.
Hopping on the train making fun of Kellyanne Conway 's decision to kneel on the Oval Office couch earlier this week, actor (and former member of Barack Obama 's administration) Kal Penn took a moment on Wednesday to spoof POTUS' controversial counselor .
Related: White House On Kellyanne's Endorsement Of Ivanka Trump's Clothing Line 
Taking a break from playing press secretary to Kiefer Sutherland 's president on Designated Survivor – the 39-year-old shared from set: 
Kal-E-Anne pic.twitter.com/9Q1bLmi0lA 
— Kal Penn (@kalpenn) March 1, 2017 
Bravo!
Sadly, the resemblance is uncanny…
[ Image via AP Images / Twitter . ]
Tags: barack obama , funny , kal penn , kellyanne conway , kiefer sutherland , politik
